SELECT DISTINCT r.id, r.name, r.description, r.created_at, r.updated_at FROM roles r, itsnow_msc.accounts acc LEFT JOIN itsnow_msc.users u ON acc.id = u.account_id LEFT JOIN authorities a ON u.username = a.username WHERE r.name = a.authority
AND acc.id = #{accountId}
mapper.select: AND r.name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}

select count(*) from roles r left join authorities a on r.name = a.authority left join itsnow_msc.users u on u.username = a.username left join staffs stf on stf.user_id = u.id left join departments d on d.id = stf.dept_id left join sites s on s.id = stf.site_id where r.name like #{keyword}

select r.id, r.name, r.description, r.created_at, r.updated_at, u.username, d.name deptName, s.name siteName, acc.name accountName from roles r left join authorities a on r.name = a.authority left join itsnow_msc.users u on u.username = a.username left join staffs stf on stf.user_id = u.id left join departments d on d.id = stf.dept_id left join sites s on s.id = stf.site_id left join itsnow_msc.accounts acc on acc.user_id = u.id where r.name like #{keyword} order by ${sort} ${dir} limit #{offset}, #{size}
